p: BALB/c mice (6 weeks old; n = 6) were injected intraperitoneally at day 0 with an emulsion (1:1) containing 50 μg of purified rSHNP or rJHNP, expressed in Escherichia coli, in a final volume of 100 μL with complete Freund´s adjuvant (CFA). Fourteen and twenty-eight days after initial immunization, mice were re-injected intraperitoneally with an emulsion (1:1) containing 50 μg of purified rSHNP or rJHNP in a final volume of 100 μL with incomplete Freund´s adjuvant (IFA).
